row.process: ! ---------------------------------- ! Parameter für JOBI.SQL definieren: ! ---------------------------------- :SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "PDBAPP" :SET &ORASCRIPT# = "&BATCH_LC#.sql" ! ---------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ | tee &RUNDIR#/&ORASCRIPT# prompt Ausgeben Datum und Timestamp select sysdate, systimestamp, user from dual; set timing on set echo on exec pdb.pr_trigger_vb38958('JPDFNK21', 'ENABLE') exec pdb.pr_trigger_vb38958('JPDFNK22', 'ENABLE') __EOF__ ! ---------------------------------------- ! Aufruf des SQL-Includes für csv-Ausgabe: ! ---------------------------------------- :INC JOBI.SQL ! ------------------ ! Returncode setzen: ! ------------------ exit $rc
